title: Reject Damaged Material Delivery
description: A delivery of windows arrives on site, but the foreman notices several are cracked. The delivery must be rejected.

tasks.description: Document the damage by taking photos of the cracked windows.
tasks.expected_outcome: Photographic evidence of the damage is captured.

tasks.description: Update the status of the purchase order to 'Delivery Rejected - Damaged'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The PO status is updated in the procurement system.

tasks.description: Notify the supplier of the rejection and attach the photos, requesting an immediate replacement shipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: The supplier is formally notified of the issue and a replacement is requested.
